question:
[Victor] took his sister [Kerrie] too the zoo but his sister [Isabel] could n't come because she had to work. [Morgan], who is the sister of [Joy], is a lovely girl. [Kevin] sat with his daughter, [Valerie], for ice cream at a local shop. [Isabel] asked her mother, [Joy], what they were going to have for lunch. [Morgan] wanted to visit an art museum, so she asked her father, [Kevin] to take her. [Valerie] went to the store with her sister [Morgan] [Brian] and his brother [Kenneth] went hiking with [Brian]'s mother, [Debra]. [Debra]'s daughter, [Morgan], brought the supplies.
Question: How is [Kenneth] related to [Kerrie]?
